thread.section_title: Kresta Blinds & Curtains Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kresta Blinds & Curtains | kresta.com.au
thread.title: Rachael Cook
thread.title_full: Kresta Blinds & Curtains reviewed by Rachael Cook

author: Rachael Cook
title: Rachael Cook
text: My experience with Kresta has been simply fantastic! From the moment I met Michael, who spent as much Christmas time as needed with me to look at all options for my home, I knew Kresta was the right choice. He listened, and came up with out of the box solutions for my home. Then the gentleman (sorry I forget his name), who came to install was just as lovely. He had a challenge with installing one curtain as my window was curved and he had to makeshift up something he had never die before, but he delivered. Both gentlemen were fantastic and made the whole experience seamless. And our curtains look amazing! Thank you!
